terms: Provide the customer's contact information to Microsoft and invited partners if provided.
Provide my company's employee information to Microsoft and invited partners that I am inviting
Grant Microsoft and invited partners the right to use such information to contact the customer or partner employee for purposes of fulfilling Microsoft's obligations to partner and customer.
consent.label: Consent
consent.description: By checking this box, I confirm, on behalf of myself and my company, that I have obtained sufficient consent. *

info.private: Please note that you have changed the deal type to
info.team: You will need to enter the name, phone number, and email address of the employees working on this deal. You need to have at least one contact with all the details entered for you to create a deal. These details can be changed even after creating a deal.
info.yes: This referral will be visible and actionable to the Microsoft Sales team. This referral will be a partner-led co-sell opportunity.
info.no: This referral will NOT be visible or actionable to the Microsoft Sales team. The referral data will be used by internal Microsoft reporting systems for analyzing and forecasting purposes. This co-sell opportunity will be a private deal. You can upgrade a private deal at any time prior to being a non-terminal state (won, lost, declined, and expired).
info.tryToChangeSolution: All the existing solutions in this deal will be removed if you change deal type to Service CO-sell.

ValidationMessage.monthsRange: Contract duration must be between 1 and 60 months.
ValidationMessage.yearsRange: Contract duration must be between 1 and 5 years.
ValidationMessage.nameInvalidChars: Angle brackets < and > are not allowed.

buyerAwsAccountId.label: Buyer AWS account ID
buyerAwsAccountId.validation: Enter a valid 12-digit AWS account ID

Name.label: Private Offer Name
Name.tooltip: The offer name is visible to buyers. We recommend including the buyer ID, company name, and a high-level description (such as upgrade, renewal). Avoid including any personally identifiable information (such as first/last name, phone number, address).
Name.validationMessage: Offer name can have up to 150 characters. Invalid characters are (<),(>),(\).
Name.validationCharater: Provide offer name with fewer than 150 characters.

DealReferenceID.label: Private Offer Reference Id
DealReferenceID.tooltip: This is autogenerated GUID. This will be unique for each private offer.

Description.label: Private Offer Description
Description.placeholder: Description is for your reference only
Description.tooltip: The offer description isn't visible to buyers. Describe your offer in 2-3 sentences.
Description.validationInvalid: Provide offer description with fewer than 255 characters.
Description.description: Offer description can have up to 255 characters.

PreparedBy.label: Sales Agent Primary Contact
PreparedBy.validation: Sales Agent Primary Contact is Required
PreparedBy.required: Sales Agent Primary Contact is Required

recipientsEmail.label: Recipients Email
recipientsEmail.tooltip: Add the email addresses of the ISV personnel who should be notified about activity on the private offer.

tagsDetails.label: Custom Metadata
tagsDetails.tooltip: Custom Metadata helps in providing additional information on the private offer that is extended to the customer and this will show up in the Email Notification which the ISV receives. This consists of a Name and Value. For Example: You can have a Custom Metadata with the Name as Region and Value as NA.

CustomerName.label: Customer Company Name
CustomerName.tooltip: Provide the name of your customer.

CustomerAccountId.label: AWS Account ID
CustomerAccountId.tooltip: You can add the AWS account ID for up to buyer who youd like to target with the private offer. The AWS account ID is a 12-digit number, such as 012345678901, that uniquely identifies an AWS account.
CustomerAccountId.placeholder: Only one Buyer Account ID can be added.
CustomerAccountId.validation: The AWS account ID is Required

customerRecipientsEmails.label: Recipients Email
customerRecipientsEmails.tooltip: Add the email addresses of the customer personnel who should be notified about the private offer.

pricingModelDesc.label: Choose a pricing model for the offer.

offerStartDate.label: Start date
offerStartDate.description: Date the services in this offer can start begin used

offerEndDate.label: End date
offerEndDate.description: Final date the services in this offer can be used

offerExpired.label: Offer Expiration Date
offerExpired.description: The buyer must respond to your offer by the provided date before 23:59 (UTC), otherwise the offer will expire.

usageExpired.label: Offer Expiration Date
usageExpired.description: The buyer must respond to your offer by the provided date before 23:59 (UTC), otherwise the offer will expire.

usageDuration.label: Usage Duration
usageDuration.description: This offer switches back to public price after the specified number of days. The subscription end date is determined from the buyer subscription date plus the below duration.
usageDuration.tooltip: After the contract duration ends, buyer can use metering price for the duration specified below.

reOfferExpiredDate.label: Offer Expiration Date
reOfferExpiredDate.description: Note: Offer expires at 23:59:59PM UTC on the date indicated.

serviceEndDate.label: Service End Date
serviceEndDate.description: Final date the services in this offer can be used

offerCurrency.title: Offer Currency
offerCurrency.label: Currency
offerCurrency.tooltip: Choose a transaction currency for this offer. You will receive payment in the selected currency.
offerCurrency.aboTooltip: Select currency negotiated with the buyer. You will receive payment in the selected currency.
offerCurrency.descOne: To enable a currency, you must set your bank disbursement preference for that currency in your Seller account settings.
offerCurrency.descTwo: The currency you choose will be used for all aspects of the offer. Buyers will receive the offer and pay for it using this currency, and you'll receive your payment in the same currency. After you create the offer, you cannot update the currency. To change the currency, you must create a new offer.
offerCurrency.descThree: If you want to receive payment using a UK bank account, you must complete the Know Your Customer process. Failure to do so will result in the inability to create offers.

productDimension.label: Product Dimensions
productDimension.description: Choose from existing dimensions to include in the private offer or add custom dimensions. Any new custom dimensions added will be accessible in this product for future private offers once this offer is published.
productDimension.ShortNote: Customize the prices or units for :

quantityDimension.label: Quantity per contract dimension
quantityDimension.description: Specify the quantity for each selected dimension. To remove a dimension, deselect it from the table above.

paymentSchedule.label: Buyer installment plan
paymentSchedule.description: Enter the contract total, frequency, and first invoice date to generate an installment plan. Your invoices will be generated follow the specified frequency on the set invoice dates.
paymentSchedule.note: The installment plan applies to the contract total. For products with usage-based pricing, any additional usage beyond the contract terms will be billed separately based on the unit price.

contractDetails.desc: Buyers are charged using the contract price for each dimension in this duration.

termAndConditionsDetails.desc: All files are combined into single PDF.

totalContractValue.label: Contract total
totalContractValue.description: Contract total can include digits (0-9) and decimal points (.).

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Contract total can include digits (0-9) and decimal points (.).

initalPayment.label: Initial payment
initalPayment.description: Use this to set a different amount for the 1st payment. The remaining balance will be divided equally across subsequent payments.

error.totalContractValueMissMatch: The total amount in the installment plan must match the total amount due.
error.generatePlan: You must generate an installment plan.
